text:
Heading: Market Research Analysis: Fin Tech-Enabled D2C Farm Products in Tamil Nadu, India
Subheading: Opportunities in the Market
Embedded Financial Services: AI-based credit scoring and BNPL (Buy Now, Pay Later) for farm inputs. Blockchain-Based Supply Chain: Transparent pricing and fraud prevention. Subscription-Based D2C Models: Regular fresh produce deliveries through digital platforms. Microfinance & Working Capital Solutions: Supporting small-scale farmers with easy-access loans. Logistics & Cold Chain Financing: Enhancing storage and transport efficiency for perishable goods.
